content.text:
Old Man : Harvest 

Standard tuning

[Intro]
 
First cord is played as follows...

At 5th fret - hammer on and off G at 5th fret 3X then slide same cord structure down to 2nd fret doing strum
down, up, down while doing hammer ons and pull offs on the high e string at frets 3 then 2.
e|-0-|---|-----------------
B|---|-6-|-----------------
G|-5-|---|-----------------
D|-0-|---|-----------------
A|-0-|---|-----------------
E|-x-|-x-|-Mute with thumb 



 [ch]FM7[/ch]       [ch]D[/ch] [ch]Dsus4[/ch] [ch]D[/ch]    
 [ch]FM7[/ch]       [ch]D[/ch] [ch]Dsus4[/ch] [ch]D[/ch]  


[Chorus]

 [ch]FM7[/ch]                                     [ch]D[/ch]          
 Old man look at my life, I'm a lot like you were     
 [ch]FM7[/ch]                                     [ch]D[/ch]          
 Old man look at my life, I'm a lot like you were     


[Instrumental]

 [ch]D[/ch] [ch]F[/ch] [ch]C[/ch] [ch]G[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch] [ch]F[/ch] [ch]C[/ch] [ch]F[/ch]

DWB: (try a quick F-G at the end of the phrase on the way back to D)
     

[Verse 1]
         
 [ch]D[/ch]       [ch]F[/ch]               
 Old man look at my life 
 [ch]C[/ch]                       [ch]G[/ch]           
 Twenty four and there's so much more
 [ch]D[/ch]               [ch]F[/ch]       
 Live alone in a paradise
      [ch]C[/ch]                 [ch]F[/ch]
 That makes me think of two

DWB: (try a quick F-G at the end of the verse on the way back to D)


[Verse 2]

 [ch]D[/ch]          [ch]F[/ch]           
 Love lost, such a cost,
 [ch]C[/ch]                   [ch]G[/ch]              
 Give me things that don't get lost.
 [ch]D[/ch]                [ch]C[/ch]               
 Like a coin that won't get tossed
 [ch]F[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]   
 Rollin' home to you.


[Instrumental]

 [ch]D[/ch] [ch]Am7[/ch] [ch]Em7[/ch] [ch]G[/ch] [ch]D/F#[/ch]

DWB: (Between to D and Am7, try Dsus4->D->D9->D, pulling-off the high E from the
3rd fret to 2nd fret to open E, then a quick punch on the 2nd fret again)


[Verse 3]
       
 [ch]D[/ch]                                    [ch]Am7[/ch]      [ch]Em7[/ch]  [ch]G[/ch]
 Old man take a look at my life I'm a lot like you
 [ch]D[/ch]                             [ch]Am7[/ch]       [ch]Em7[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch] 
 I need someone to love me the whole day through
 [ch]D[/ch]                                   [ch]Am7[/ch]         [ch]Em7[/ch]  
 Oh, one look in my eyes and you can tell that's true.


[Instrumental]

 [ch]D[/ch] [ch]F[/ch] [ch]C[/ch] [ch]G[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch] [ch]F[/ch] [ch]C[/ch] [ch]F[/ch]

(DWB: play a quick F-G at the end of the phrase on the way back to D)


[Verse]

    [ch]D[/ch]          [ch]F[/ch]                        
 Lullabies, look in your eyes,
 [ch]C[/ch]                       [ch]G[/ch]  
 Run around the same old town.
 [ch]D[/ch]          [ch]F[/ch]   
 Doesn't mean that much to me 
 [ch]C[/ch]                       [ch]G[/ch]  
 To mean that much to you
 [ch]D[/ch]          [ch]F[/ch]   
 I've been first and last
 [ch]C[/ch]                       [ch]G[/ch]  
 Look at how the time goes past.
 [ch]D[/ch]          [ch]F[/ch]   
 But I'm all alone at last.
 [ch]C[/ch]                       [ch]G[/ch]  
 Rolling home to you.


[Chorus]

 [ch]FM7[/ch]              [ch]D[/ch]    [ch]Dsus4[/ch]     [ch]D[/ch]  
 Old man look at my life, I'm a lot like you were
[ch]FM7[/ch]              [ch]D[/ch]    [ch]Dsus4[/ch]     [ch]D[/ch]  
 Old man look at my life, I'm a lot like you were

[Outro]

[ch]D[/ch] [ch]F[/ch] [ch]C[/ch] [ch]G[/ch]
[ch]D[/ch]       


 notes :
 [ch]FM7[/ch] : x00560
 [ch]Dsus4[/ch] : x00233
 [ch]D9[/ch] : x00320
 [ch]Am7[/ch] : x002010
 [ch]Em7[/ch] : 022030

 FM7 is x00560, and you repeatedly hammer-on the third (G) string (0h5)
 The mention of Dsus4 is to indicate that you should fiddle around with the
 high E string, between D, Dsus4 and D9.

(DWB: I made the corrections he notes in the next paragraph, and fixed up the ending)

Just looking at the file right now, i wonder if the line: D F C G  D F C G
 (or D F C G x2 )  is correct - strikes me it should end in F. hmmm
 
If you make any additions or corrections - let me know of them!
 cheers! rcwoods@unix1.tcd.ie

content.text:
[Verse 1]

[ch]F#m[/ch]
Feeling used
But I'm
[ch]E[/ch]
Still missing you
And I can't

[ch]C#m[/ch]
See the end of this
            [ch]D[/ch]
Just wanna feel your kiss
Against my lips
        [ch]F#m[/ch]
And now all this time
Is passing by
       [ch]E[/ch]
But I still can't seem to tell you why
   [ch]C#m[/ch]
It hurts me every time I see you
  [ch]D[/ch]
Realise how much I need you


[Chorus]

  [ch]F#m[/ch]
I hate you I love you
   [ch]E[/ch]
I hate that I love you
      [ch]C#m[/ch]
Don't want to, but I can't put
[ch]D[/ch]
Nobody else above you
  [ch]F#m[/ch]
I hate you I love you
   [ch]E[/ch]
I hate that I want you
    [ch]C#m[/ch]
You want her, you need her
     [ch]D[/ch]
And I'll never be her


[Verse 2]

[ch]F#m[/ch]
I miss you when I can't sleep
    [ch]E[/ch]
Or right after coffee
Or right when I can't eat
  [ch]C#m[/ch]
I miss you in my front seat
           [ch]D[/ch]
Still got sand in my sweaters
From nights we don't remember
[ch]F#m[/ch]
Do you miss me like I miss you?
[ch]E[/ch]
Fucked around and got attached to you
[ch]C#m[/ch]
Friends can break your heart too, and
     [ch]D[/ch]
I'm always tired but never of you
[ch]F#m[/ch]
If I pulled a you on you, you wouldn't like that shit
[ch]E[/ch]
I put this reel out, but you wouldn't bite that shit
[ch]C#m[/ch]
I type a text but then I never mind that shit
[ch]D[/ch]
I got these feelings but you never mind that shit
[ch]F#m[/ch]
Oh oh, keep it on the low
[ch]E[/ch]
You're still in love with me but your friends don't know
[ch]C#m[/ch]
If you wanted me you would just say so
[ch]D[/ch]
And if I were you, I would never let me go

[Chorus]

  [ch]F#m[/ch]
I hate you I love you
   [ch]E[/ch]
I hate that I love you
      [ch]C#m[/ch]
Don't want to, but I can't put
[ch]D[/ch]
Nobody else above you
  [ch]F#m[/ch]
I hate you I love you
   [ch]E[/ch]
I hate that I want you
    [ch]C#m[/ch]
You want her, you need her
     [ch]D[/ch]
And I'll never be her

[Verse 3]

[ch]F#m[/ch]
I don't mean no harm
        [ch]E[/ch]
I just miss you on my arms
        [ch]C#m[/ch]
Wedding bells were just alarms
         [ch]D[/ch]
Caution tape around my heart
[ch]F#m[/ch]
You ever wonder what we coulda been?
[ch]E[/ch]
You said you wouldn't and you fucking did
[ch]C#m[/ch]
Lie to me, lie with me, get your fucking fix
[ch]D[/ch]
Now all my drinks and all my feelings are all fucking mixed
[ch]F#m[/ch]
Always missing people that I shouldn't be missing
          [ch]E[/ch]
Sometimes you gotta burn some bridges just to create some distance
        [ch]C#m[/ch]
I know that I control my thoughts and I should stop reminiscing
        [ch]D[/ch]
But I learned from my dad that it's good to have feelings
[ch]F#m[/ch]
When love and trust are gone
         [ch]E[/ch]
I guess this is moving on
[ch]C#m[/ch]
Everyone I do right does me wrong
    [ch]D[/ch]
So every lonely night, I sing this song


[Chorus]

  [ch]F#m[/ch]
I hate you I love you
   [ch]E[/ch]
I hate that I love you
      [ch]C#m[/ch]
Don't want to, but I can't put
[ch]D[/ch]
Nobody else above you
  [ch]F#m[/ch]
I hate you I love you

I hate that I want you

You want her, you need her

[ch]F#m[/ch]                         [ch]E[/ch]
All alone I watch you watch her

Yeah all alone I watch you watch her

[ch]F#m[/ch]                   [ch]E[/ch]
How is it you never notice
